title: Tayari Jones | A Closer Look: Trump's Easter Immigration Rant, Cabinet Turmoil
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump celebrating Easter by ranting about immigrants while more key members of his Cabinet are accused of corruption.

Then, author Tayari Jones explains the origin of the title of her book An American Marriage, gives advice to young aspiring writers and recounts her very Important call from Oprah.

Jones also speaks backstage with Late Night producer Sarah Jenks-Daly just for this podcast.
